items.title: Well Hello There
items.description:
My name is Jon and I program visual interfaces for the web. I write web applications, data visualizations, and full-scale websites.

My programming interests lie in application architecture, device formats, filesize and processor/memory efficiency, drawing with geometry, trigonometry and color, and of course data wrangling.

I write code, consult, and even build teams tailored to a specific project's needs.
Download my résumé for more info about me and the kind of work I've done.

I like to talk to people!
Send me an email if you are looking for a developer, or simply to say hello.
